title: Chloe Aiello: CNBC Digital News Associate
text:
Chloe Aiello: CNBC Digital News Associate Published 11:42 AM ET Tue, 1 May 2018 Updated 3:09 PM ET Wed, 9 May 2018 CNBC.com
"My name is Chloe Aiello, and I'm a digital news associate for CNBC.com.
I met CNBC through the Business News Associate Workshop.
For me, the workshop provided a glimpse into the day-to-day life at CNBC, as well as giving me the opportunity to mix and mingle with future colleagues on a level an interview just couldn't replicate. "Maintaining composure in a breaking news situation, thinking quickly and creatively to cover bases when reporting and working collaboratively with colleagues are all skills intrinsic to success at CNBC."
The business news associate workshop touched all of those bases through fun and engaging exercises.
Anyone who's considering a career in business news would be hard-pressed to find a similar experience at as esteemed a company as CNBC.
For me, the Business News Associate Program and Workshop really are one-of-a-kind." Business News Associate Workshop at #AAJA18 | Houston | Aug 10
